queries.query: select dealer_id,dealer_name,casino_id,status from dealer_details where casino_id = :casinoId;
update casino_details set balance_amount = balance_amount + :amount where casino_id = :casinoId
update game_details set status = 'CLOSED', end_time = now(), modified_at=now() where game_id = :gameId
update user_details set current_casino = :casinoId where user_id = :userId
update user_details set balance_amount = balance_amount + :amount where user_id = :userId

select game_id, start_time, gd.dealer_id, dealer_name from game_details gd join dealer_details dd on gd.dealer_id = dd.dealer_id join user_details ud on ud.current_casino = dd.casino_id where gd.status = 'OPEN' and user_id = :userId
update user_details set balance_amount = 0 where user_id = :userId
select count(1) from game_details where status = 'OPEN' and game_id = :gameId

select balance_amount - current_bet_amount as balance_amount from user_details ud left join (select sum(bet_amount) current_bet_amount, user_id from bet_details where bet_status is null group by user_id) user_current_bet on user_current_bet.user_id = ud.user_id where ud.user_id = :userId;
select bet_id, bet_amount, bet_number, user_id from bet_details where game_id = :gameId
select dd.casino_id from game_details gd join dealer_details dd on gd.dealer_id = dd.dealer_id where game_id = :gameId
update game_details set thrown_number = :thrownNumber where game_id = :gameId
